direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the internal state of the map, but clear removes all entries while put adds or updates a single entry.
Both methods involve modifying the map's entries, with clear removing all entries and remove targeting a specific entry.
Both methods involve synchronized operations on the map, with clear synchronizing on each bucket to clear it, and atomic synchronizing on each bucket to execute a Runnable.
Both methods access the map's buckets and locks, but clear modifies the buckets while containsKey checks for the presence of a key.
Both methods access the map's locks and buckets, but clear modifies the buckets while size retrieves the count of entries.
